javadoc: ConflictInfoPanel appears above the 4 listings in the ListingMergeWindow. It indicates the current sub-phase of the ListingMerge (Code Units, Functions, Symbols, etc.). It also indicates how many groups of conflicts to resolve (typically address ranges), how many individual conflict need resolving for that address range, and how far you are along in the process.

methods.javadoc: Creates a new ConflictInfoPanel to use above the listings.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a new ConflictInfoPanel to use above the listings.

methods.javadoc: Returns a string indicating the current phase of the Listing merge.
methods.name: getConflictType
methods.comment: Returns a string indicating the current phase of the Listing merge.

methods.javadoc: Returns the current address being resolved as displayed by this panel.
methods.name: getAddress
methods.comment: Returns the current address being resolved as displayed by this panel.

methods.javadoc: Returns the current address being resolved as displayed by this panel.
methods.name: getAddressRange
methods.comment: Returns the current address being resolved as displayed by this panel.

methods.name: setConflictType
methods.comment: Call this to set the phase of the Listing merge that you are in currently.

params.name: conflictType
params.comment:
the type of conflict being resolved by this phase
 (for example, Symbols).

methods.javadoc:
Sets the current register name when this panel is being used for register conflict information.
@param registerName the register name.
methods.name: setRegisterInfo
methods.comment: Sets the current register name when this panel is being used for register conflict information.

methods.name: setAddressInfo

params.name: addressNum
params.comment: number for the current address being resolved

params.name: totalAddresses
params.comment: total number of addresses to resolve

methods.name: setCodeUnitInfo

params.name: addressNum
params.comment: number for the current address range being resolved

params.name: totalAddresses
params.comment: total number of addresses to resolve

name: ConflictInfoPanel
comment:
ConflictInfoPanel appears above the 4 listings in the ListingMergeWindow.
 It indicates the current sub-phase of the ListingMerge (Code Units, Functions, Symbols, etc.).
 It also indicates how many groups of conflicts to resolve (typically address ranges),
 how many individual conflict need resolving for that address range,
 and how far you are along in the process.
